WhatToSay: Message printed when the mod loads
name: Name
empire_tab_description: This mod currently provides default Chinese/English language templates for the game
create_empire_description: Force the selected country into the empire
remove_title_description: Remove the de jure claim from the current city
unity_new_empire: A new empire has been created
empire_selected: A country has been selected, select another country to create a new empire
unity_joined_empire: This country has been incorporated into the empire's sphere of influence
save_freeze_toggle_Text Description: Since saving causes game lag and there is currently no physical solution to this issue, this option disables the save function. If you need to save, please enable this function in the mod settings (mandatory).
create_province_description: Click on any city within the empire to create a province
remove_province_description: Click on any city within a province to remove it
create_title_description: Click on a city to create a new title
add_title_description: Add the selected city to the specified de jure title
add_province_description: Add the selected city to the province
actor_create_kingdom_description: Click on a character to create a city
prevent_city_destroy_description: When enabled, if a city's population drops below 1, the country will actively transfer population to the city via military forces.
empire_royal_clan_changed: $actor$ usurped the Mandate of Heaven of $empire$, changing the dynastic name to $new_empire_name$.
kingdom_royal_clan_changed_2: $new_clan$ defeated $old_clan$ and became the new ruler of $kingdom$
powerful_minister_aquire_empire_war: $title$ $ministor$ attempted to seize the Mandate of Heaven of $empire$, starting a war
become_new_empire_log: $emperor$ declared himself emperor, establishing the dynastic name $kingdom_name$
opinion_different_empire_with_other_subs: Another Empire of the Same Race
ministor_try_aqcuire_empire_log: $title$ $ministor$ attempted to seize the Mandate of Heaven of $empire_name$
ministor_aqcuire_empire_log: $title$ $ministor$ successfully seized the Mandate of Heaven, establishing the dynastic name $new_empire_name$
empire_powerful_minister_aquire_title: Powerful Minister $ministor$ demanded a title from the $empire$ emperor, calling himself $title$
king_take_title_log: $kingdom$ $king$ acquired the de jure claim of $title_name$
title_been_controlled: Country currently controlling the de jure claim
king_create_title_log: $kingdom$ $king$ created the de jure claim of $title_name$
become_kingdom_log: $actor$ changed the country name to $kingdom$ due to acquiring the de jure claim of $title$
city_add_to_title_log: $city$ has been incorporated into the de jure claim of $title_name$
new_jingshi_log: $empire$ has concluded the palace examination. $actor$ achieved high marks in the imperial hall, granted the title of Palace Graduate, bringing honor to the nine clans!
become_greater_general: $actor$ was conferred the title of Heavenly Strategy General of $empire$, establishing a military government with the highest honors!
Title_Freeze_Toggle Description: De jure claims will not be actively destroyed
Title_Been_Destroy_Text: De jure destruction event trigger time (unit/year)
title_layer_description: Display current map de jure claims
kingdom_selected_first: First country selected, select a second country or empire to create a new empire or join an empire
city_selected_first: A city has been selected, select a second city or title range to create or join
create_new_title: A new title has been created
create_new_province: A new province has been created
city_add_to_title: The city has been incorporated into the title range
city_add_to_province: The city has been incorporated into the province range
city_need_to_belong_empire: Only cities under direct imperial jurisdiction can be selected
input_species: Enter text to search for species...
plot_kingdom_change_name: Change to De Jure Title Name
plot_kingdom_change_name_info_base: Change to De Jure Title Name
plot_ministor_acquire_empire: Powerful Minister Seizes Mandate of Heaven
plot_ministor_acquire_empire_info_base: Powerful Minister Seizes Mandate of Heaven
plot_officer_grab_alliance_info: Spend influence to support a clan member's rise to power
plot_emperor_set_armed_province_info: Establish military provinces on the empire's borders to defend the central government
plot_powerful_minister_controled_empire_: Powerful Minister initiates a plot to control the cabinet
plot_powerful_minister_take_city: Military Governor Encroaches on Imperial Territory
plot_powerful_minister_take_city_info_ba: Military Governor spends one-tenth of the empire's influence to seize the nearest imperial territory
history_new_empire: $actor$ declared himself emperor at $place$, establishing the dynastic name $name$, with the capital at $place$
history_new_emperor: $actor$ ascended the throne at $place$, era name $year_name$
history_powerful_ministor: $title$ $actor$ controlled the government, $actor2$ became a puppet
histroy_empire_die: Emperor $actor$ of the $year_name$ era passed away
history_name_previous_emperor: $actor$ posthumously honored the late emperor $actor2$, granting the posthumous name $shihao$ and temple name $miaohao$
history_change_capital: $actor$ decided to move the capital to $place$
history_refund_empire: The imperial capital fell, but the ministers supported a new emperor, rebuilding the empire at $place$
history_back_to_original_capital: $actor$ lived up to expectations and finally recaptured $place$, returning to the old capital.
history_kingdom_attack_for_title: $attacker$ declared war on $defender$, attempting to acquire the de jure claim of $title$
history_kingdom_change_capital_to_title: $kingdom$ moved its capital to $city$, the de jure capital of $title$
